text: eyata firavunge janatavagen vu pradhanin (firavunta) “musada ohuge janatavada bhumiyehi aparadha kara obavada, oba (visin æti karana lada) devivarunvada pratiksepa kara damana men oba ovunva athæra damannehida?”yi vimasuha. eyata ohu “(noeseya!) ovunge pirimi daruvanva kapa dama, (ovunva avaman kara damanu pinisa) ovunge gæhænu daruvanva (pamanak) pana pitin jivat vannata ida harinnemu. niyata vasayenma api ovun kerehi adhipatyaya taba ættemu. (ebævin api kæmati andamatama ona dæyak kala hækiya)” yayi ohu kiveya
